channel.title: Projects on Guillermo de Anda-Jáuregui
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Guillermo de Anda-Jáuregui

item.title: My Projects
item.description: Network Biology of Breast Cancer: High-throughput, multi-omics data of breast cancer can be studied through the use of network approaches. Some of the things me and my colleagues have studied include: How transcriptional networks capture the heterogeneity of breast cancer molecular subtypes. Differences in the modular structure of breast cancer networks and subtype-specific functions associated to certain subtypes of breast cancer. The loss of inter-chromosomal co-expression in breast cancer, and how information-theoretical approaches can be used to study this spatial organization phenomena.
